name: AVCapturePhotoSettings
desc: A specification of the features and settings to use for a single photo capture request.

items.name: format
items.desc: A dictionary describing the processed format (for example, JPEG) to deliver captured photos in.

items.name: processedFileType
items.desc: The container file format for eventual output of the processed image.

items.name: rawFileType
items.desc: The container file format for eventual output of the RAW image.

items.name: rawPhotoPixelFormatType
items.desc: An identifier for the Bayer RAW pixel format to deliver captured RAW photos in.

items.name: uniqueID
items.desc: A unique identifier for this photo settings instance.

items.name: previewPhotoFormat
items.desc: A dictionary describing the format for delivery of preview-sized images alongside the main photo.

items.name: embeddedThumbnailPhotoFormat
items.desc: A dictionary describing the format for delivery of thumbnail images embedded in photo file output.

items.name: availableRawEmbeddedThumbnailPhotoCodecTypes
items.desc: An array of video codec types compatible with the photo settings for embedding raw thumbnail images in photo file output.

items.name: rawEmbeddedThumbnailPhotoFormat
items.desc: A dictionary describing the format for delivery of raw thumbnail images embedded in photo file output.

items.name: availableEmbeddedThumbnailPhotoCodecTypes
items.desc: An array of video codec types compatible with the photo settings for embedding thumbnail images in photo file output.

items.name: availablePreviewPhotoPixelFormatTypes
items.desc: An array of available kCVPixelBufferPixelFormatTypeKeys available to specify a preview photo format.

items.name: flashMode
items.desc: A setting for whether to fire the flash when capturing photos.

items.name: isAutoRedEyeReductionEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to use auto red-eye reduction on flash captures.

items.name: isHighResolutionPhotoEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to capture still images at the highest resolution supported by the active device and format.

items.name: isCameraCalibrationDataDeliveryEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether a dual photo capture also delivers camera calibration data.

items.name: photoQualityPrioritization
items.desc: A setting that indicates how to prioritize photo quality against speed of photo delivery.

items.name: isAutoVirtualDeviceFusionEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to use automatic virtual-device image fusion.

items.name: virtualDeviceConstituentPhotoDeliveryEnabledDevices
items.desc: The constituent devices for which the virtual device should deliver photos.

items.name: isAutoStillImageStabilizationEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether captures use automatic image stabilization.

items.name: isAutoDualCameraFusionEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether captures automatically combine data from a dual camera device.

items.name: isDualCameraDualPhotoDeliveryEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether a dual camera device delivers images from both cameras.

items.name: livePhotoMovieFileURL
items.desc: A URL at which to write Live Photo movie output.

items.name: livePhotoMovieMetadata
items.desc: A dictionary containing metadata to be included in the Live Photo movie file.

items.name: livePhotoVideoCodecType
items.desc: The video codec to use for encoding the movie portion of Live Photo output.

items.name: isDepthDataDeliveryEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the photo output captures depth data along with the photo.

items.name: embedsDepthDataInPhoto
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether any depth data captured with the photo is included when generating output file data.

items.name: isDepthDataFiltered
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether to smooth noise and fill in missing values in depth data output.

items.name: isPortraitEffectsMatteDeliveryEnabled
items.desc: Specifies whether a portrait effects matte should be captured along with the photo.

items.name: embedsPortraitEffectsMatteInPhoto
items.desc: Specifies whether the portrait effects matte captured with ths photo should be written to the photo's file structure.

items.name: embedsSemanticSegmentationMattesInPhoto
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether to write the enabled semantic segmentation matte types captured with this photo to the photoâ€™s file structure.

items.name: enabledSemanticSegmentationMatteTypes
items.desc: An array of semantic segmentation matte types that the photo render pipeline can deliver.

items.name: metadata
items.desc: A dictionary of metadata keys and values to embed in photo file output.

items.name: capturePhoto
items.desc: Initiates a photo capture using the specified settings.
